WTF. I'm 100% sure this is not a demo, as I'm currently playing it ().

Downloaded it
Opened it with UltraISO
Selected the big 5gig file
Unpacked it in a folder
Copied all other files over to that folder
Installed the game using installer
Copied over the launcher from crackedcontent into GameFiles map
And then double clicked the crackedlauncher (I renamed the old launcher in GameFiles to LEGOHarryPotter2 and launched LEGOHarryPotter)
It worked.
Btw, my download was called "Lego Harry Potter" with 279 seeders and 1425 peers.
WTF! Demo! thanks for nothing Markolie!

I just wanted to post a comment here to state that I downloaded this torrent, and it is THE FULL VERSION -- just follow the instructions and remember to transfer the cracked content over before you run the game, and be sure to use the correct launcher. It does work, it is not a trial if you follow the steps. Just wanted to backup Markolie on this one since he's gotten a lot of grief for this. It works perfectly, and I enjoy it and will definitely be buying it!

Duh. Just download it from Pirate Bay. Ultra Iso Premium that is. Fuck..

Ok, guys, I'm feeling especially nice today, so I'm going to tell you what you should do: 

a) Download the freaking torrent;

b) In the main folder, you should see a file named "avd-lhp.mdf";

c) Download Ultra Iso or a similar program if you don't have one ( http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6368410/Ultra_ISO_Premium_Edition_v9.3.6_(Registered__Install__amp__Enjoy) )

d) On Ultra Iso, open this file. 

e) Now, this is the tricky part: In that file, there will be a file named "LEGOHarryPotter". Delete it. Now go to the folder named "Lego Harry Potter" again and enter the folder named "Crack-Reloaded". Copy the only file there and paste it on the UltraIso/similar program. 

f) Save that UltraIso file on the "Lego Harry Potter" folder. 

g) Using a program like Daemon Tools, mount the file you just created. 

h) Go to "My Computer" and install it normally. 

i) Click "Play" and have fun!

Actually, forget that last point about clicking "Play"
If it works, great, if the doesn't, click "Open" on the game file on "My Computer", enter the "GameFiles" folder and click on the application there. Sorry.
